column1: 384 and says in paragraph 76 of the above Written Submissions, as follows,
“Although their Lordships’ have stated that Basnayake C.J.’s decision in
Hayleys has been upheld in the Rodrigo’s case, the respondent respectfully
submits that it is Sinnatamby J’s decision that the expenses and outgoings
are both limited to those incurred in the production of income that has
been, in effect, upheld in Rodrigo’s case”.
